entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Logo Creator„Çú
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Object PackÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí $0.00 [$0.00 ~ $0.99]
  • PremiumÔºö$79.99 ‚Üí $29.99 [$29.99 ~ $79.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

In-App Purchases

  • Object PackÔºö$0.00
  • PremiumÔºö$29.99

Application Description

Create your next logo on your iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch with InstaLogo Logo Maker. And with a fresh new design and Apple Watch support, it‚Äôs even easier to create a great-looking logo and design on the go. ***** InstaLogo Logo Maker turns your iOS device into a logo-making machine. In minutes, you can design logos, posters, flyers, invitations and more. Then, share them with your friends or colleagues via email, upload them to Dropbox, Evernote and Box, save them to your iOS device, or send them to be printed. It‚Äôs never been easier. ***** You‚Äôre in good hands with the most popular logo maker app on the App Store, whenever you want to: Create Beautiful Logos - Choose from a massive library of logos - Import your photos from your Photo Library - Select from a huge selection of fonts, or import your own - Copy and paste text, images and more into InstaLogo Logo Maker - Pinch, drag and spin your logo elements to change size and perspective Adjust & Modify An Existing Logo - Change the gradient and color of your logos, text and background - Add professional-grade shadows - Use grid lines to align everything perfectly - Move elements by the degree, for super accurate results Fix A Mistake - Undo and redo every step - Erase any part of your logo, or the whole thing, easily - Move things around with the Lasso tool Release Your Creativity - Draw with your finger or a stylus, now with 3D Touch support - Select colors from the new color palette app on Apple Watch - Let your creativity fly with support for iPad Pro and Apple Pencil Share and Save Your Logos - Save with a transparent background, perfect for everyday use - Upload your images to Dropbox, Evernote and Box, so they‚Äôre safe and shareable - Share your logos by email or upload them directly to Facebook ***** Feature List: - Works on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch - Support for iPad Pro, Apple Pencil and Apple Watch - Multitasking support on iPad Air 2 and newer - 3D Touch support for iPhone 6s, 6s Plus, 7 and 7 Plus - Works in landscape and portrait - Over 50,000 logo combinations - More than 270 handpicked latin and non-latin fonts - Move, resize, rotate, flip, and nudge objects - Fill text and logos with images - Add custom borders to your text - Adjust text spacing and arc - Professional RGB/HSB/Hex color picker - Favorites color palette - Canvas and photo cropping - Adjust opacity - Smart guides - Professional shadow editor - Full Undo and Redo - Finger and stylus support - Eraser tool - Lasso tool - Transparent PNG support - AirPrint support - Available in 29 languages ***** Some features may require in-app purchases. SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS Pro Subscription gives you unlimited access to our premium content and features. Our app offers 1 auto-renewing subscription option: - Annual Plan: $29.99 per year. - Free trial subscription is automatically renewed unless cancelled 24 hours before the renewal. - Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. - Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase, but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. - Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. - Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. - These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary, and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence. You can read our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy here: http://instalogocreator.com/terms http://instalogocreator.com/privacy Download it NOW!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Northgard
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $5.99 [$5.99 ~ $7.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$5.99

In-App Purchases

  • Scale BundleÔºö$6.99
  • Fur BundleÔºö$6.99
  • Clan of the DragonÔºö$2.99
  • Clan of the snakeÔºö$2.99
  • Clan of the KrakenÔºö$2.99
  • Clan of the HorseÔºö$2.99
  • Clan of the LynxÔºö$2.99
  • Winter BundleÔºö$6.99
  • Clan of the SquirrelÔºö$2.99
  • Clan of the EagleÔºö$2.99

Application Description

Northgard is a strategy game based on Norse mythology in which you control a Clan of Vikings fighting for the control of a mysterious newfound continent. After years of tireless explorations, brave Vikings have discovered a new land filled with mystery, danger and riches: NORTHGARD. The boldest Northmen have set sail to explore and conquer these new shores, bring fame to their Clan and write history through conquest, trading, or devotion to the Gods. That is, if they can survive the dire Wolves and Undead Warriors roaming the land, befriend or defeat the giants, and survive the harshest winters ever witnessed in the North. FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Build your settlement on the newly discovered continent of Northgard ‚Ä¢ Assign your vikings to various jobs (Farmer, Warrior, Sailor, Loremaster...) ‚Ä¢ Manage your resources carefully and survive harsh winters and vicious foes ‚Ä¢ Expand and discover new territory with unique strategic opportunities ‚Ä¢ Achieve different victory conditions (Conquest, Fame, Lore, Trading...) STORY MODE: RIG‚ÄôS SAGA The Viking High King is murdered and his Regal Horn is stolen by a man named Hagen. This event kickstarts a saga that will take Rig, his son and heir accompanied by his right-hand man Brand through the new continent of Northgard. The continent where he will make new friends and foes and discover a much greater threat than Hagen, and the reasons behind his father‚Äôs assassination. MULTIPLAYER ‚Ä¢ Play with or against other Mobile players with up to 6 players ‚Ä¢ Includes Duel, Free for All and Teamplay modes CHOOSE YOUR CLAN In order to complete the 11 campaign chapters, the player will have to master the specificities of the 6 first clans and tame the unforgiving wilderness of Northgard. More clans are joining the fight for Northgard! ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Snake: Act from the shadows and take the lead with cunning guerilla tactics ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Dragon: Embrace the old ways and please the gods with sacrifices ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Kraken: Harness the bounty of the sea and unleash its brutal might You can unlock the clans of the Snake, Dragon and Kraken separately by buying the DLCs, or together with the Scale Bundle. ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Horse: Devote yourself to the art of blacksmithing and craft powerful Relics ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Ox: Equip ancestral equipment and prove the might of your forefathers ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Lynx: Adopt Nature‚Äôs way and lure mythical preys into ambushes You can unlock the Clans of the Horse, Ox and Lynx separately by buying the DLCs, or together with the Fur Bundle. ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Squirrel: Gather ingredients to prepare special recipes and survive the harsh winters ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Rat: Embrace the way of the Shamans and work for the clan ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Eagle: Occupy a large territory, venture outside and gather resources Unlock the clans of the Squirrel, Rat and Eagle separately by buying the DLCs, or together with the Winter Bundle. Carefully redesigned for mobile ‚Ä¢ Revamped interface ‚Ä¢ Game Center achievements ‚Ä¢ iCloud - Share your progress between iOS devices If you experience any issue with Northgard, please contact our customer support at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Streets of Rage 4
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $7.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

In-App Purchases

  • Mr. X Nightmare DLCÔºö$2.99

Application Description

Punch your way through the Streets of Rage once again! Streets of Rage 4 takes forward the Streets of Rage legacy in this retro beat'em up with hand-drawn comic inspired graphics and updated mechanics. Streets of Rage comes back for a sequel 25 years after the last episode : a new crime syndicate seems to have taken control of the streets and corrupted the police. All you have to fight against them is your friends... and your fists ! Critically acclaimed, Streets of Rage 4 won several awards and nominated as Best Action Games at the 2020 Game Awards. FEATURES - Rediscover the classic Beat em up Streets of Rage Franchise with new fight mechanics - Get thrilled by the Retro hand-drawn comics-inspired artistic direction by the studio behind Wonder Boy: The Dragon‚Äôs Trap serving juicy animations & vivid FX - Unlock up to 5 new & emblematic playable characters and fight your way through 12 various stages to bring back order to the streets - Challenge yourself in different modes : Story, Training, Arcade... - Listen to a new Electro OST with world class musicians such as Olivier Derivi√®re and legend Yuzo Koshiro - Brand-new custom survival mode to the DLC (Mr. X Nightmare) - New destroyables to help to maintain the combo counter"- Get retro with up to 13 alternative retro characters, secret retro levels or choose the SoR1&2 OST and enable the Retro Pixel graphics ! * NEW MAJOR FREE UPDATE* - New co-op moves - +300 in-game improvements - Brand-new custom survival mode to the DLC (Mr. X Nightmare) - New destroyables to help to maintain the combo counter -MULTIPLAYER UPDATE- - Play online with a partner and gang up to defeat the Y twins' evil plan together! - Test your strength : hop in Battle Mode and fight your friends across your favorite levels" -Mr. X Nightmare DLC- The fight continues in Wood Oak City. After the events of Streets of Rage 4, our heroes wanted to prepare themselves for future threats. Axel, Blaze and their mates will start a very special deranged training with the help of Dr. Zan, who built an AI program from the remnants of Mister X‚Äôs brain that simulates every kind of danger they could be facing. With this DLC, get ready for: ‚Ä¢ 3 new playable characters ‚Ä¢ A new Survival mode with weekly challenges ‚Ä¢ Character customization: build your own fighting style with new moves ‚Ä¢ New weapons and enemies!o note that multiplayer mode will not be available at launch but will come in a free update after release. CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE - Revamped interface - Game Center achievements - iCloud - Share your progress between iOS devices - Compatible with MFicontrollers - No micro-transactions! Crack your knuckles and get ready for Streets of Rage 4 everywhere you go! If you run into a problem, please contact us at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com with as much information as possible on the issue, or check our FAQ at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/6-streets-of-rage-4/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Resident Evil Village for Mac
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$39.99 ‚Üí $9.99 [Free ~ $39.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$9.99

In-App Purchases

  • DLC packÔºö$9.99
  • All Access VoucherÔºö$1.99
  • Street Wolf OutfitÔºö$2.29

Application Description

Experience survival horror like never before in the 8th major installment in the Resident Evil franchise - Resident Evil Village. With detailed graphics, intense first-person action and masterful storytelling, the terror has never felt more realistic. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†In-App Purchases ‚ñ†Resident Evil Village (Base Game) „ÉªThe Trauma Pack DLC „ÉªSamurai Edge - AW Model-01 „ÉªResident Evil 7 Found Footage Filter „ÉªResident Evil 7 Tape Recorder Save Point „ÉªSaferoom Music "Go Tell Aunt Rhody" „ÉªMr. Everywhere Weapon Charm „ÉªUnlock "Village of Shadows" Difficulty „ÉªThe Tragedy of Ethan Winters Artwork „ÉªThe Baker Incident Report „ÉªSurvival Resources Pack „ÉªMr. Raccoon Weapon Charm ‚ñ†Winters' Expansion „ÉªExperience brand-new additional content for the award-winning modern horror masterpiece Resident Evil Village: Third Person Mode, The Mercenaries Additional Orders, and Shadows of Rose. „ÉªStreet Wolf Outfit „ÉªStreet Wolf Outfit for Rose (applies to Shadow of Rose content only) ‚ñ†Extra Content Shop All Access Vouche ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†By purchasing, you will be granted a license to use the product. ‚ñ†A network connection is required when starting the application. ‚ñ†About the End User License Agreement „ÉªThis End User License Agreement (this ‚ÄúAgreement‚Äù) applies to the user‚Äôs use of this game software program (the ‚ÄúProgram‚Äù). „ÉªTHIS AGREEMENT SHALL COME INTO EFFECT BETWEEN CAPCOM CO., LTD. AND USER(S) UPON INSTALLATION OF THE PROGRAM BY THE USER. „ÉªThose users between the ages of 13 and 18 (or between 13 and the age of legal majority in your country of residence) or a person with limited capacity shall install the Program only after obtaining approval from its parent or legal guardian who agrees to be bound by these provisions of this Agreement. Please confirm the terms above and agree to this Agreement before purchasing the Program. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†A limited part of the base game can be played for free. In order to play the full game, an in-app purchase is required. ‚ñ†This game can be played without a controller, however we recommend using a controller as the game has been optimized for controller use. ‚ñ†This application is approximately 35GB. Important Note: The installation process requires that you have at least twice the size of the application in free storage space available. We recommend downloading the data in an environment with good connectivity. ‚ñ†Save data upload and download functionality via iCloud Drive has been added. ‚ñ†Save data cannot be uploaded and downloaded between MacOS and iOS devices. ‚ñ†Resident Evil Village does not support Universal Purchase. ‚ñ†Purchase Precautions „ÉªAfter purchase, returns (including exchange for other products/services) will not be provided for any reason. „ÉªIn-app purchases can only be used by the Apple Account that made the purchase and cannot be shared with Family Sharing members. ‚ñ†Compatible OSs and Devices https://www.capcom-games.com/apple/en-us/ ------------------------------------------------------------ RESIDENT EVIL is a trademark and/or registered trademark of CAPCOM CO., LTD. and/or its subsidiaries in the U.S. and/or other countries.

  • Charm: 'Handgun Ammo'Ôºö$0.99
  • Charm: 'Green Herb'Ôºö$0.99
  • Attach√© Case: 'Classic'Ôºö$0.99

Application Description

Survival is just the beginning. Six years have passed since the biological disaster in Raccoon City. Agent Leon S. Kennedy, one of the survivors of the incident, has been sent to rescue the president's kidnapped daughter. He tracks her to a secluded European village, where there is something terribly wrong with the locals. And the curtain rises on this story of daring rescue and grueling horror where life and death, terror and catharsis intersect. Featuring modernized gameplay, a reimagined storyline, and vividly detailed graphics, Resident Evil 4 marks the rebirth of an industry juggernaut. Relive the nightmare that revolutionized survival horror. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†By purchasing, you will be granted a license to use the product. ‚ñ†A network connection is required when starting the application. ‚ñ†About the End User License Agreement „ÉªThis End User License Agreement (this ‚ÄúAgreement‚Äù) applies to the user‚Äôs use of this game software program (the ‚ÄúProgram‚Äù). „ÉªTHIS AGREEMENT SHALL COME INTO EFFECT BETWEEN CAPCOM CO., LTD. AND USER(S) UPON INSTALLATION OF THE PROGRAM BY THE USER. „ÉªThose users between the ages of 13 and 18 (or between 13 and the age of legal majority in your country of residence) or a person with limited capacity shall install the Program only after obtaining approval from its parent or legal guardian who agrees to be bound by these provisions of this Agreement. Please confirm the terms above and agree to this Agreement before purchasing the Program. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†A limited part of the base game can be played for free. In order to play the full game, an in-app purchase is required. ‚ñ†Keyboard and mouse are not supported. ‚ñ†We recommend playing this game with a controller. It can be played on an iPad, but using a controller will provide a better experience. Note: Please check the Apple website for controllers compatible with iPad. Not all controllers will work as intended. ‚ñ†This application is approximately 30GB. Important Note: The installation process requires that you have at least twice the size of the application in free storage space available. We recommend downloading the data in an environment with good connectivity. ‚ñ†Estimated download time based on connection speed: 10Mbps - Over 6 hours 100Mbps - 30 to 40 minutes 300Mbps - 8 to 10 minutes ‚ñ†Save data can be uploaded and downloaded between MacOS and iOS devices. ‚ñ†Purchase Precautions „ÉªAfter purchase, returns (including exchange for other products/services) will not be provided for any reason. „ÉªIn-app purchases can only be used by the Apple Account that made the purchase and cannot be shared with Family Sharing members. ‚ñ†Compatible OSs and Devices https://www.capcom-games.com/apple/en-us/ ------------------------------------------------------------ RESIDENT EVIL is a trademark and/or registered trademark of CAPCOM CO., LTD. and/or its subsidiaries in the U.S. and/or other countries.

entry.title: DEATH STRANDING DIRECTOR'S CUT
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$39.99 ‚Üí $19.99 [$19.99 ~ $39.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$19.99

Application Description

From legendary game creator Hideo Kojima comes a genre-defying experience, now expanded in this definitive DIRECTOR‚ÄôS CUT. In the future, a mysterious event known as the Death Stranding has opened a doorway between the living and the dead, leading to grotesque creatures from the afterlife roaming the fallen world marred by a desolate society. As Sam Bridges, your mission is to deliver hope to humanity by connecting the last survivors of a decimated America. Can you reunite the shattered world, one step at a time? DEATH STRANDING DIRECTOR'S CUT on iOS includes a HIGH FRAME RATE, PHOTO MODE, and cross-over content from Valve Corporation's HALF-LIFE series and CD Projekt Red's Cyberpunk 2077. Stay connected with players around the globe with the Social Strand System‚Ñ¢. Mac and iOS ‚Ä¢ Sign-in to iCloud and activation of iCloudDrive are required to play this product. ‚Ä¢ This product can be played offline, but a network connection is required to fully experience the Social Strand System‚Ñ¢. Communication fees will be incurred during online play. Only for iOS version ‚Ä¢ When playing this product for the first time, you will be required to download additional data. You can start the game once you have downloaded approximately 13 GB, but additional downloads will occur as the game progresses, requiring a total of approximately 50 GB of downloads. Additional downloads will occur when additional language voice data is used. FAQs https://505.games/DSDCAppStoreFAQ

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Application Description

Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. entry.title: Neo Monsters
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $0.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

  • 150 GemsÔºö$79.99
  • 74 GemsÔºö$40.99
  • 28 GemsÔºö$14.99

Application Description

Become a Legend! Capture over 2000 Animated Monsters and Duel in Real-Time PvP! Form your team and battle for victory! Capture, train, and evolve to become the champion in one of the biggest monster battling RPGs! Neo Monsters is an addictive strategy RPG that features epic 4v4 battles between two teams of up to 16 monsters. The unique turn-based battle system allows you to come up with powerful chain strategies by combining hundreds of abilities. Hunt down the strongest monsters and harness their power, then take the battle online to dominate in exciting PvP battles and leagues! Are you ready to take the challenge? ‚ñ∂Features: ‚óè Build your Monster Collection ‚Ä¢ Capture and evolve over 1000 fully animated monsters! ‚Ä¢ Train your monsters and unleash their deadly potential. ‚Ä¢ Collect evolution ingredients to create the ultimate power! ‚óè Form a Battle Strategy ‚Ä¢ Build the ultimate team of up to 16 monsters. ‚Ä¢ Defeat your opponents in epic turn-based 4v4 battles! ‚Ä¢ Create devastating combinations from hundreds of abilities. ‚óè Become the Champion ‚Ä¢ Conquer six Leagues and take on the Grand Champion in 60+ hours of adventure! ‚Ä¢ Explore multiple islands and dungeons on your journey. ‚Ä¢ Follow the story to uncover the truth behind your late uncle‚Äôs atrocity. ‚óè Take the Battle Online ‚Ä¢ Duel players from around the world in PvP leagues! ‚Ä¢ Complete 100+ online missions. ‚Ä¢ Take on weekly updated events to unlock big rewards. Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NeoMonstersOfficial/ Join the Neo Monsters community: http://www.neomonstersforum.com/ Issues or questions? Contact our support: neomonsupport.gameplay@zigzagame.net Terms of Service: https://www.zigzagame.com/terms/ Privacy Policy: https://www.zigzagame.com/privacy-policy/

entry.title: OOTP Baseball 26 Go!
entry.content:

In-App Purchases

  • OOTP26 Pack Booster BundleÔºö$19.99 ‚Üí $14.99 [$14.99 ~ $49.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$9.99

In-App Purchases

  • OOTP26 Pack Booster BundleÔºö$14.99
  • 25,000 PP for OOTP Go 26!Ôºö$19.99
  • 175,000 PP for OOTP Go 26!Ôºö$99.99
  • 12,000 PP for OOTP Go 26!Ôºö$9.99
  • 75,000 PP for OOTP Go 26!Ôºö$49.99
  • 5,500 PP for OOTP Go 26!Ôºö$4.99

Application Description

Take the beloved Out of the Park Baseball series with you wherever you go. The award-winning baseball simulation game is now in your hands wherever you are in the world! Manage teams, control any franchise in 2025 or throughout MLB History, build and draft your Perfect Team, build a completely fictional baseball universe and so much more. You can oversee your league at a high level or play out each game in the gorgeous 3D game mode, managing play by play or even pitch by pitch. OOTP has it all covered. Play Your Way ¬∑ Franchise Mode: A single-player oriented mode where you can run your favorite MLB, KBO, international or fictional baseball organization. 2025 MLB and 2025 KBO seasons - with accurate teams, schedules, and rosters - are included! Plus! 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons also included. ¬∑ Perfect Team Mode: Build a dynasty in this online mode competing against players around the world. Manage MLB History ¬∑ Gain access to historical MLB leagues and rosters from 1901 - 2024 ¬∑ Simulate any and all MLB scenarios and games that you have dreamt of ¬∑ Manage all on-field decisions and strategies ¬∑ Draft, scout, trade, and sign players to build a powerhouse Official MLB & KBO Licenses ¬∑ Full 2025 rosters from both MLB & KBO franchises free with game purchase ¬∑ Includes full MLB and MiLB rosters Create Your Perfect Team ¬∑ Create your own custom team to pit against players around the world ¬∑ Cross-platform compatibility with Out of the Park Baseball 26 users ¬∑ Pull and collect player cards from the vast player pool available ¬∑ Compete in tournaments against other players to see who has the best team New This Year ¬∑ Full Scouting System: Improve scouting accuracy on players, develop reports, choose priorities, assign scouting budgets, and more ¬∑ 3D Upgrades: New dynamic scoreboard, custom randomized fictional park generation ¬∑ Roster, AI, and Engine: Greatly improved AI, added more variety and detail in players ratings by expanding the internal scale ¬∑ KBO Improvements: Added military service time and free agent cash compensation ¬∑ Perfect Team Notifications: New settings all you to choose what to receive push notifications about ¬∑ Perfect Team Clubhouse Stars: Purchase exclusive cards and pack bundles with these Stars; earned through tournaments, Perfect Draft, and league play. ¬∑ Perfect Team Variants: New and revamped boosted-card mechanic, with a more user friendly way to boost; "feed as you go" ¬∑ And more! OOTP Go 26 comes with an additional three historical MLB seasons for FREE! Run any franchise from the 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons. All other historical MLB seasons (1901-2024) available for purchase. Major League and MiLB trademarks and copyrights are used with permission of Major League Baseball. Officially Licensed Product ‚Äì MLB Players, Inc. PLAYERS CHOICE¬Æ Out of the Park Developments ¬© Copyright 2025. All Rights Reserved * Access permission notice for gameplay ¬∑ STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos. ¬∑ MEMORY: Recommended system minimum of 2 GB RAM ¬∑ PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls. ¬∑ CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account. ‚Äª You'll be able to enjoy the service except features related to above authorities even if you don't give permission to the above. "Consumer Information: ‚Ä¢ Language support: English, ÌïúÍµ≠Ïñ¥ ‚Ä¢ Items are available for purchase in this game. Some paid items may not be refundable depending on the type of item. ‚Ä¢ For Com2uS Mobile Game Terms of Service, visit http://www.withhive.com/. - Terms of Service : http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T1 - Privacy Policy : http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T3 ‚Ä¢ For questions or customer support, please contact our Customer Support by visiting https://support.ootpdevelopments.com/portal/en/home
